description: (1)Alterations and conversion of the former school building (excluding schoolkeepers house) to provide 50 residential units comprising 23 x 1-bedroom flats  21 x 2-bedroomed flats & 6 x 3-bedroom flats and associated car parking(2) Redevelopment of the playground site for housing as a 4 and 5-storey infill comprising 44 units of 15 x 1-bedroom flats  13 x 2 bedroom flats 12 x 3-bedroom flats and 4 x 4-bedroom maisonettes and associated car parking and new turning head in Rufford Street. . (3) Works to Bingfield Park including the erection of new boundary railings  extension of park boundaries re-alignment of pedestrian footpaths  resiting and provision of new lighting standards  construction of a park-keeper's hut and landscaping provisions.
decision_conditions: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.
